Method Detail

setSubmitter

public void setSubmitter(ContactRec contact)
Set the reference to the contact record that contains the contact information for the contact who created the GEDCOM.

IMPORTANT This ContactRec must have already been added to the GEDCOM earlier via the GEDCOM.addContactRec(ContactRec) method.

Parameters:
contact -
See Also:
GEDCOM.setSubmitter(ContactRec), GEDCOM.addContactRec(ContactRec)
